page.title: 20Acknowledgements/Authors
page.content: In compiling this entry for the Domesday Project,our thanks go to all the staff and children of the Upper Junior Department of Bugbrooke C.P. School 1984/5.Every child took part, but particular note is taken of the work entered individually by: Marnie England and Vernon Bainton- "The brook";John Kattenhorn and Vernon Bainton "Home Technology";Katherine Parker "Bugbrooke Surgery";Damian Perkin "A day in the life" The school is also particularly grateful to Mr.Geoffrey Allport for entering the data and providing advice on computing. The other staff who contributed were: Mr Bazeley, Mrs Hurst,Mr Langrish.
